Reviews.Title: Review of RCA 13.3 inch LCDTV/DVD
Reviews.Author: Deb S
Reviews.Content: My husband and I are very pleased with the picture color and sound on our new RCA 13.3 inch TV/DVD.  We would highly recommend this TV.  This TV is perfect for the small space that we have for it in our kitchen.  It was very difficult to find a new small TV since most companies want to sell the very large TV's.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: acerbas
Reviews.Content: I wanted a small HDTV that I could put up on my desk so I could multi-task while using my MacBook Pro. I just set it up tonight, and so far am pleased with it. Since the screen is only about two feet from my eyes the small screen size is not particularly an issue. Phenomenally it appears larger than the larger HDTV that I watch across the room at my friend's house. I can't give it 5 stars, though, because the picture does not appears as sharp and crisp as hers. But its still a heck of a lot better than the CRT set that it replaced, and its possible that it might be better after I tweak the settings. Overall, I am pleased that I bought this set, based on my research it appeared to be the best one to fit my needs, and so far I am forced to agree.

Reviews.Title: Dave Kuhn 13.3 inch AC/DC RCA TV
Reviews.Author: David Kuhn "cuda22"
Reviews.Content: Fantastic tv.  All and more than I expected!!!!!  Works like a dream come true.  Had trouble playing CD discs on my lap top,,,,this solved the problem.

Reviews.Title: Too small, must view straight on.
Reviews.Author: Krissy
Reviews.Content: This tv is very small & lightweight. That may be acceptable for some purposes, like mobile viewing, but not for my kitchen. Also, when viewing the screen, you have to view straight on or the pic is really distorted. It looks terrible. I purchased a larger one at Walmart for less money.

Reviews.Title: Post "Sandy" Christmas Gift to my mom
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Rankine
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift I bought for my mom after Hurricane Sandy left her without power (and other services) for approx. 2 weeks.  I wanted a portable battery-operated TV but apparently they do not make those anymore.  However, there are emergency rechargeable batteries that you can plug electronic devices into AND this TV can be plugged into automobiles so that pretty much fits the bill.  The LCD TV is also pretty good quality - very clear picture and sound and the DVD player is a definite plus.  I still wish we could just dump a couple D batteries in it and go but apparently that's no longer an option with any portable TV these days.  Frankly, RCA should look into doing just that - making their LCD TV operate on regular batteries.  In the case of Hurricane Sandy where there wasn't any power for a lot of people for weeks, recharging batteries WAS NOT AN OPTION!

Reviews.Title: Unsatisfactory
Reviews.Author: Lu
Reviews.Content: The write up on this product did not mention that it can not be viewed at an angle but MUST be viewed at eye level and straight on and this was most unsatisfactory for the location it was to be used as a kitchen TV.  Product had to be returned.

Reviews.Title: It's OK, But
Reviews.Author: Nathan Robinson
Reviews.Content: I needed a small screen for the bathroom vanity to replace a Sony CRT model that finally gave up the ghost. I reviewed feedback on several different models of small TV's before purchasing this one.  This one has proven to have the same disappointments I read about other models - picture and sound.  The angle - up/down and left/right of the screen has to be square with your viewing angle or the picture is degraded.  This may be inherient in all LED models.  Most disappointing is the sound.  It has the tin sound instead of quality audio.  It appears RCA compromised the sound by using too small speakers to keep the depth of the TV thin.I will keep this one because I can't identify other models with any expectation they would be better.  The manufacturers have almost abandoned the small screen market.  It would be good if one of them would make a quality model without the DVD player, etc. that has the best picture and sound even if it cost more.  This one can't hold a candle to the Sony CRT model it replaced.

Reviews.Title: DVD does not eject.
Reviews.Author: Elmer Kraft
Reviews.Content: I have tried all ways I can think of but the DVD will not eject.  Just received the TV today and mainly wanted to watch DVD when in our camper.

Reviews.Title: Pleased, good value
Reviews.Author: AJBUCH
Reviews.Content: First off, I didn't buy this from amazon - I found it significantly cheaper at another online site, but since I normally shop online at amazon, thought I'd share my review here.I mounted this in my kitchen using an under-cabinet mount I bought from amazon - "Mount-It! LCD Tilt Swivel Under Cabinet Mount" (See my review of the mount under that product)  I shopped online quite a bit and while this wasn't the cheapest tv I found, it was the best price for a brand name that I recognized.The picture on this tv is really good - even in SD using RG-6 coax. Of course, HD using HDMI is even better. I installed in a corner and the picture is decent up to 45 degree angles, but best viewed straight on. (that mount I mentioned enables swivel/rotating to mitigate any viewing angle issues.) The sound is lousy, but that's common on tvs this size. The tv is really the perfect size for my kitchen. A really nice feature is the USB port - I put recipes organized by category in folders on a USB drive and it works great on the kitchen tv.There are a few things that could be better - RCA engineers take note... The wall plug is huge and ugly (2" x 4" x 1.5").  The coax input sticks straight out of the side of the tv - pretty ugly too. The remote is very light-weight and cheap feeling. The contours and bulges on the back of the tv (due to the thickness of the DVD player) get in the way of the mounting bracket (I had to use spacers) and while it does have standard VESA mounting holes, they are off-center.  Loading DVDs is not intuitive - the correct loading of a dvd has the label side away from you and the mirror side of the dvd facing you.  Although its clearly labeled on the side of the dvd tray, one is typically in front of the tv, not on the side looking at the tray.  None of these are show stoppers for me but detract enough to earn only 3 stars.  I posted some images to show my under-kitchen-cabinet installation of this tv. See "Product Images from Customers"

Reviews.Title: Nice personal TV
Reviews.Author: Walter Fisher Jr. "Waltie"
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV almost a year and found the HD picture very good but the sound is a bit tinny, so I connected some computer speakers to it for much better bass.  Yes you do have to look at it straight on, but that's not a problem for me as I watch it while I am on the computer at night.  I took it on a camping trip to VT. last week and ran it off a small 12v battery for one hour when I lost the sound, but still had a great picture.  Apparently the sound will cut out after the voltage gets below 11 or 10 volts with the small 12vdc battery.  The next night I ran it directly from my auto battery for almost 3 hrs. (no problems) The auto started fine the next morning also.  Having the built in DVD is nice when on a camping trip, when you can not pick up any TV stations. All in all for me not a bad little TV and I got for under $90 on black Friday.

Reviews.Title: No regrets
Reviews.Author: tdret
Reviews.Content: Perfect selection for our kitchen. Sound is a bit tinny, but after adjusting the equalizer it is much better. Picture is sharp and bright. DVD player works well.

Reviews.Title: Awkward controls
Reviews.Author: 68redcedar
Reviews.Content: The Picture is good, when broadcast on 720p or 1080i antenna TV, but 480 seems to be pretty poor.  My buddies Visio TV, much larger, seems clearer on the 480P channels than this TV.The Buttons on top of the TV are backwards.  The slider bar on the volume goes to the left when pushing the button on the right, which is kind of foolish, but those buttons are rarely used anyway.I sent the first one back as the remote control did not function.  The speakers were all crackly/buzzy when new, and I voided the warranty by opening it up and tightening the mounting screws, which worked temporarily, but in the intervening year the buzzing has disappeared.For whatever reason my channel 10(actual) has an annoying crackle on it, but only on that particular channel.Sometimes channel 30.1(actual 38) will produce sound but no picture until I move to another channel than back to it.Seems to have slightly better reception than my previous 7"  12 volt TV, and only draws ~0.3 amps more.Draws 0.9 to 1.1 amps watching  antenna TV and slightly more on a DVD, which is less than the rating and what I expected, which is nice for battery life.  It will draw 0.08 amps when it has power but is not turned on.  I put a switch on the power cord to reduce this unneeded battery draw.  It does not lose memory settings when all power is removedI have not used it with cable TV, or any of the other multitude of input options

Reviews.Title: This TV was DOA.
Reviews.Author: Dwight Myers
Reviews.Content: This item was returned it was DOA. The power supply was NG The return went well.A lot of trouble for nothing.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: ann
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV for my kitchen. We couldn't get the TV screen to turn on. When it finally did come on, the picture quality really was not good. Then when I went to turn it on the next day the green light came on w/no picture. The following day the TV went on for about 2 minutes then flashed & would not go on again. Lost a lot of time taking back etc. Very disappointed in an RCA product.

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: LARRY WOODING
Reviews.Content: I purchased this set about 6 wks ago. IT has a good pic.  Now after its been on for a few hours the sound becomes garbled also tonite channel 3 went out. I can unplug it and every thing works fine. I lost the receipt so I cant send it back. I guess I blew $106.00

Reviews.Title: Lacks adjustability
Reviews.Author: A. C. Croft
Reviews.Content: My only complaints are two: first was that it was not delivered at the time promised, although that did not turn out to be a problem. The second and more important complaint would be the lack of adjustability of the monitor. It has a plastic pedestal that screws into the monitor with a single Phillips head screw. The screen is perfectly perpendicular to the flat surface it is placed upon and will not tilt. (It also does not swivel.) So if one happens to be sitting in a position such their their head is about level with this screen, all will probably be well. But if one is sitting at a desk--or worse, standing--the viewing angle is not likely to be good. We intended to use this at seminars to demonstrate DVD programs to attendees who would be standing, looking down at the monitor placed on a table. This wouldn't work, so we had to remove the pedestal and lay the monitor part on a slanted makeshift surface. On the upside, this unit is nice and light for putting in a suitcase, and is unique in terms of size and style.

Reviews.Title: SMALL TV
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: Needed small TV for kitchen.  It acts more like a radio than a TV because unless you stand directly in front of it the screen is just dark.

Reviews.Title: Not up to par for RCA
Reviews.Author: Judy Churchwell
Reviews.Content: I agree with most customers who have bought this item.  The sound quality is less than good, and you cannot view the screen unless you see it straight forward.  If I am sitting at my computer looking straight at it, for the most part, the picture is not good quality.  I kept the tv, but was extremely disappointed a I have had several RCA brand tvs in the past that were excellent.

Reviews.Title: Meh...Save your pennies a little longer and buy something worth spending the money on
Reviews.Author: NFLMVP
Reviews.Content: I owned this TV for over a year and I was never thrilled with it.  I didn't have any of the problems that some of the negative reviews talked about but my big complaint is the same as every other.  The viewing angle is terrible!  One minor complaint was the amount of time it took for the TV to start up but I would barely ding the rating for that.  If not for the bad viewing angle, I'd be giving this a much better review...at least 4 stars.  However, This is a big deal and after a year, I still could not overlook this flaw.I used the TV in the master bath and even in that small area, the viewing angle made it hard to enjoy the quality of the picture, which otherwise was very good, when viewed straight on and at eye level.  However, this single MAJOR flaw is bad enough that I finally retired it and replaced it with a non-DVD, refurbished, 19" Samsung that I LOVE.FWIW, I never used the DVD player...not even to test it.  I bought this based on price alone, which I almost never do but I figured it was a small risk, based on the price.  Live and learn.

Reviews.Title: Nice little TV for the kitchen
Reviews.Author: Susan Lozano "Sue"
Reviews.Content: Would have given it 5 stars if not for the poor quality sound. Hubby hooked up a pair do computer speakers and now the sound is great!

Reviews.Title: I wish RCA Checked Checked the Sound Quality
Reviews.Author: KBB
Reviews.Content: This little tv is the perfect size for my space, put the sound quality is awful. Also, the picture quality is kind of wavy at different points. I would like to return it. I cannot recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Tiny TV JUST PERFECT for the space - and it plays CD's too!
Reviews.Author: Ride to the Music
Reviews.Content: This is just the size I needed to fit into an small antique desk with a drop down front/writing area.  The desk is in my sewing room - and the TV HAD to be able to be hidden when not in use in order for the room not to look cluttered,  None of the big (or small) local stores carry this small size TV - I was REALLY frustrated looking for this size in a physical store.  I am not bothered by the fact that you have to look straight at it to get the best visual - as other reviewers have stated.  I listen to the TV (news, etc) more than watch it when I am sewing.  A BIG plus for me - which I didn't realize it had when I ordered it (duh) was the CD playing feature.  Now I don't have to have a CD player in that room.  I don't normally order something when the reviews are so mixed.  I took a chance, however, and am glad I did.

Reviews.Title: Mostly good.
Reviews.Author: Stephen Finch
Reviews.Content: Good small tv for a kitchen or work area. Picture is decent but the sound could use some help. Delivered ahead of schedule. For the small price, this is a winner.

Reviews.Title: performs as expected
Reviews.Author: Everett G. carr
Reviews.Content: First unit had dead pixels... Vendor was very responsive and faciltate exchange/replacement. Replacement unit appears to be just fine.  Excellent size and internal dvd for cramped space

Reviews.Title: REPLACED VAN TV
Reviews.Author: allan mcdermott
Reviews.Content: I read several reviews before buying this tv and I also have a larger model in my bedroom. It came in pefect condition, packed well. I installed it on an articulating arm bracket, plugged it to a 24 volt power source and was quite happy with the picture, and the sound. It is much louder then the original one the van came with. The dvd player has played all the discs we've put in it without any problems. I am very happy with this tv.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Christine N. Kneese
Reviews.Content: We needed a small TV for a small space.  The picture is beautiful but the sound is tinny.  That is the only fault we found. I love the size. It take up practically no room at all.

Reviews.Title: Better than middlin'
Reviews.Author: jeeves
Reviews.Content: I really have had no problems with this little TV.  It is about as I expected it to be.  I just wish the sound was better, but it's all I need for an extra room.  I'm very happy with it, but if you are looking for something really good, this probably isn't for you.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Marian Danko
Reviews.Content: I am not real happy with the choice I made purchasing this TV.  The sound is of poor quality and when viewing the screen you must be facing the TV directly. I put this TV under the cabinet in the kitchen, and it really isn't the best choice of placement for this type of television. So, if you're considering this TV for under the cabinet use I would look at something else.

Reviews.Title: Poor sound
Reviews.Author: Larry   Nixon
Reviews.Content: Wanted it to replace an EDTV but sound is like a "transistor radio"  worse than AM in your car.'

Reviews.Title: good tv for rv
Reviews.Author: Gary Grimm
Reviews.Content: also does not draw too much power.  very good picture quality.  All the features of more expensive tv's that cost more.

Reviews.Title: Small TV for a Happy Customer.
Reviews.Author: Marcella P.
Reviews.Content: I needed a small TV for a small space in my kitchen.  It fits perfect!  Very happy with the color and style.  I am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Disposable TV?
Reviews.Author: Lonestar
Reviews.Content: Initially, I loved this TV. The picture and sound were excellent, and it was the perfect size to shuttle from my bedroom to my screened- in porch in the summertime. The first time I tried it, however, I found it extremely difficult to connect the cable cord. I finally took it to a TV repair person who devised a fix for that problem. Next, the AC adapter cord failed, so it was back to the TV repair shop. Then one day last summer, my little TV simply refused to turn on. At this point, it would probably cost more to repair it (assuming it's repairable) than to buy another one. One would think that a TV should last more than a year and a couple of months!

Reviews.Title: Poor quality, Dead after six months
Reviews.Author: mcwdlm
Reviews.Content: The first problem with this product is the sound quality, which is exceptionally poor.  My cell phone has better external speakers than this crappy television.  Second, it is nearly impossible to see from any angle other than dead center.  Finally, and worst of all, we got a flashing red light after just seven months of use that said "I am dead".  Completely dead in just seven months.  I would absolutely not purchase this awful bit cheap junk again.

Reviews.Title: I'm not very happy.
Reviews.Author: Munnamane
Reviews.Content: Seen from the side view, the screen is like a photographic negative. Impossible to view from any angle other than straight on.

Reviews.Title: RCA 13inchTV/DVD combo
Reviews.Author: Mary Lee Koppelman
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is terrible. The colors are muted and not very well delineated. I am very disappointed in this product and would not recommend it.

ProductInfo.Name: RCA DECK13DR 13.3" TV/DVD Combo - HDTV - 16:9 - 1366 x 768 - 720p
